name: Joe Lieberman
party: Independent  A former Democrat, Lieberman was elected on the Connecticut for Lieberman ticket in the 2006 U.S. Senate elections after a defeat in that year's Democratic primary.  Lieberman is now an Independent, but will caucus with the Democrats.
succeeded: Incumbent (2013) | date of birth = February 24 1942 | place of birth = Stamford, Connecticut
